initials:
Hello! I am HyperBot, here to help you. Please tell me what you want to do:
1. Guide through the website
2. Contact Us

intents: I want to go to guide
utterance: This is the guide! Please say either "continue" or "next" to move to the next stage of the guide.

intents: I want to go to contact

initials:
You can choose to do the following: 1. View information about our contact details
2. Submit contact form

utterance: Please check out the contact information of any of our office locations specified in the "Our Offices" section.

intents: I want to go to contact
I want to go to contact

chatbot.unknown:
Message received. We will respond within 24 hours. Do you want to 1. Send another message (redirects to contact page)
2. End this conversation

kb.areas: This is our Areas page! Here you can see all the areas that we work in! Once you're done, let me know and I can continue to the next step of the guide
kb.products: This is our Products page! Here you can see all the products that we have built! Once you're done, let me know and I can continue to the next step of the guide
kb.teams: This is Our Team page! Here you can see all the brilliant people that build our products! Once you're done, let me know and I can continue to the next step of the guide
kb.about: This is The Company page! Here you can see who we are! Once you're done, let me know and I can continue to the next step of the guide
kb.contact: This is Contact page! Here you can send us a message! Once you're done, let me know and I can continue to the next step of the guide
kb.home: This is our home page! Please feel free to browse to each section at your own pace. Once you're done, let me know and I can continue to the next step of the guide
kb.stay_message: I don't understand. Do you want to continue? Enter either next or continue or yes or go
